title: Spaghetti Carbonara
author: Luca Bianchi
description: A classic Roman dish made with eggs, pecorino cheese, and crispy guanciale.

title: Cantonese Fried Rice
author: Mei Lin
description: Stir-fried rice with peas, ham, and scrambled eggs, a simple and tasty dish.

title: Mixed Sushi
author: Haruki Tanaka
description: A selection of sushi including nigiri, maki, and sashimi with fresh fish.

title: Pad Thai
author: Somsak Prasert
description: Rice noodles stir-fried with shrimp, tofu, bean sprouts, and crunchy peanuts.

title: Lasagna Bolognese
author: Giulia Rossi
description: Fresh pasta sheets layered with meat ragù, béchamel sauce, and baked parmesan cheese.
